archimate:Capability.name: Link Layer Network Security
archimate:Capability.documentation: Protection of data can be applied at the OSI Layer 2 Data Link Layer. Network switches are key components at Layer 2 communications and are susceptible to attacks such as CAM table overflow, VLAN hopping, spanning-tree protocol manipulation, MAC address spoofing, and ARP attacks. Mitigations include configuration of port security on a switch, modification to VLAN configurations, ACLs' configuration on router ports, and 802.1X.
